content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":478272,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa342a74-68bd-4b1e-92f4-04981d7d6812/Image1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa342a74-68bd-4b1e-92f4-04981d7d6812/Image1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Image1.PNG\",\"name\":\"Image1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aa342a74-68bd-4b1e-92f4-04981d7d6812\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":745,\"height\":433},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEAR COLLEAGUE,\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to the onboarding module for Advanced Software Engineers! This module will give you an overview of EPAM tools and processes, provide you with a list of project infrastructure resources, and let you explore links to EPAM resources that can help you in your daily activities!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe structure of this module is aligned with various aspects of your work. Moreover, there are hints for tools and processes that will support your daily tasks related to advanced engineering, environment, and personal development. Please take time to read the content in this module thoroughly. You can ask additional questions to your manager or mentor. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe are delighted to see you in our EPAM ASE team and eager to make the onboarding process for you as easy as possible!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rBest regards, \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe EPAM team \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rNOTE: If you are not familiar with an acronym used in this module, you can look it up in the EPAM Acronyms directory \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/acronyms.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://info.epam.com/acronyms.html\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
